extension.name: JUX Social Tabs
extension.author: JoomlaUX

extension.description:
JUX Social Tabs

Jux Social Tabs is a module which combines 16 social networks profiles and unlimited feeds display into slick slide out or static tab with directly real time update on your site.

JUX Social Tab includes 16 famous social network such as Facebook, Twitter, Google plus, Pinterest, etc. For each social channel you can limit the number of posts to display.


Highlight feature:

  • Support Joomla 2.5 and 3.x
  • Beautiful Design
  • Real-time updates from all social pages
  • Space-saving: sliding tabs allow you to “hide” social tabs and click to open them

Links:

  • User Guide
  • Support us by Review on JED!
  • Forums
